mapper.select: SELECT e.employee_code, e.employee_name, d.department_name, p.position_name, vr.vacation_remain_date FROM employee e, employee_work ew, department d, position p, vacation_remain vr WHERE ew.employee_code = e.employee_code and ew.department_code = d.department_code and ew.position_code = p.position_code and ew.employee_code = vr.employee_code

SELECT e.employee_code, e.employee_name, d.department_name, p.position_name, vh.vacation_type, vh.VACATION_START_DATE, vh.VACATION_END_DATE, vh.VACATION_APPLY_DATE, vr.VACATION_REMAIN_DATE FROM employee e, employee_work ew, department d, position p, vacation_remain vr, vacation_change_history vh WHERE ew.employee_code = e.employee_code and ew.employee_code = vr.employee_code and ew.employee_code = vh.employee_code and ew.department_code = d.department_code and ew.position_code = p.position_code
